name: "MCA-treated Pine Wood Post Caps"
description: Decorate and protect plain wood fence and deck posts by topping them with these treated wood post caps. The plateau-shaped posts caps fit standard 6-inch posts. They're packaged in an economical six-pack and easy to install. The MCA-treated wood has a natural look and is less corrosive to fasteners. The post caps can be painted, stained or left to weather naturally.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationSouthern yellow pineUnfinished woodCan be stained or paintedCan be used indoors and outdoorsMade for a 6 in. x 6 in. postTreated with micronized copper azole (MCA) for longer lifeProtects top of post from nature's elementsResists insects and rot
